modShortDescription: If we find a rare tool/weapon, we expect it to be better. With this 7 Days to Die mod, level 6 thing: 6 mod slots. Level 5 thing: 5 slots, and so on.
modDescription:
If we find a rare [tool](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/)/[weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), we expect it to be better. In Claymore’s case: Better in at least mod slots.

The default settings kidding us to only get 4 slots now for a level 6 tool/weapon. Seriously? This is not good. Took away the ability to craft level 6 things. Fine. No problem. Limiting the max amount of mods? Even for top tier things? No. With this 7 Days to Die mod, Level 6 thing = 6 mod [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/). Level 5 thing: 5 slots, and so on. Very useful.

Compatibility: A18+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/ph99wdh06mwfl1t/Claymore_Modslots_Equals_Itemlevel.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
